Even after almost ten years, I have=
 to record, or I catch very little. 

F-S

 Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@ ...> wrote:

> I did not tape the sessions.=

rtain areas better.=A0 Thanks for the tip. - Cozy

> did you play your file back ?=A0 if you recorded it I would bet t=
here was all kinds of info on it, sometimes they start, at least for me, th=
ey started like more evp's=A0 then real time, now they do both, and at time=
s,=A0they are all chating at once it seems.=A0 I think they are talking to =
each other, not just to us. sf
> 
> In a message dated 8/14/2009 8:53:51 A.=
M. Eastern Daylight Time, cozykat2003@ yahoo.com writes:
> =A0 
> >I have h=
ad a couple sessions now and still have not heard anything.=A0 I am wonderi=
ng too if the spirits are still listening to me and letting me get my "feet=
 wet" before they will speak to me.=A0 I have been polite and have used bot=
h AM and FM bands.=A0 I tell them who I am, the day, time and location.=A0 =
I let them know my purpose for communicating and I ask for their help.=A0 I=
 am being patient with the process.

EVP-ITC] Training?

> >=A0 
> >Thanks so much, Misty. I will see if I ca=
n ask them to speak as one, because I think you hit the nail right on the h=
ead -- I do hear them speaking over each other, half in male, half in femal=
e, so maybe things would improve like you said if they organized into one c=
ollective voice. Can they still answer questions about individuals this way=
, or are you limited to generalized queries?
> >
> >Regarding your statemen=
t: "Quite often when a new speaker
> >comes forth a bit of a training sessi=
on can be heard for how they can
> >speak so that my physical self can hear=
 what is said." So by this, do you mean it's possible it takes a couple of =
sessions for the entity to master this new method of communication? For ins=
tance, I got my grandmother' s name (among others) during Tuesday's session=
, but she said nothing, wouldn't answer our questions; Wednesday, she sudde=
nly started talking and was the primary person we communicated with, even c=
orrectly answered my mother's questions about her childhood pets. Could thi=
s be because there's a learning curve involved with talking through the rad=
io? Does it take a session or two before they "get the hang of it"? Or is i=
t all dependent on my skills?
> >
> >Oh, and wanted to say I'm going out to=
morrow to buy all the canned goods at the grocery store in anticipation of =
the nuclear winter we are about to endure... Just kidding. Hearing about al=
l that stuff they are predicting, it does make me wonder, though, why they =
would go to such trouble to tell you all that again and again -- what's to =
gain from it? It's not stirring anybody up. 
> >
> >
>
